fight—!\""},{"lineNumber":160516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出来ないだろう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can't, can you?\""},{"lineNumber":160517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":160518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、君にいなくなられるのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now, losing you would be"},{"lineNumber":160519,"originalJapaneseLine":"　僕らにとっても辛い」","translatedEnglishLine":"painful for us too.\""},{"lineNumber":160520,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、君を失うことは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, losing you"},{"lineNumber":160521,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対にあってはならない損失だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"would be a loss we must never suffer.\""},{"lineNumber":160522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろん、この場を自分のいない赤の軍と、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, if you say you can't leave the Red Army in my Army,"},{"lineNumber":160524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と言うなら僕も考えるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"with this position, then I would reconsider...\""},{"lineNumber":160525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、とんでもない話です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-That's an outrageous suggestion!"},{"lineNumber":160526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰あろうエクス殿になら……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially for Lord right?\""},{"lineNumber":160528,"originalJapaneseLine":"エクスはにっこり笑い――凄んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ex smiled gently—and then looked fierce."},{"lineNumber":160529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":160530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、それでいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, that's good.\""},{"lineNumber":160531,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックは戦いを続けられぬ情けなさに","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick, frustrated that he could no longer continue the fight,"},{"lineNumber":160532,"originalJapaneseLine":"うなだれこそしたが、それ以上反論はしなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"lowered his head but did not argue further."},{"lineNumber":160533,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ひゃ〜、さすが白の軍の将軍エクス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Whoa, as expected from General Ex of the White Army..."},{"lineNumber":160534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの頑固なリック隊長をあっさり黙らせちゃった）","translatedEnglishLine":"he easily silenced that stubborn Captain Rick.)"},{"lineNumber":160535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな、僕は会ったことがないんだが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right, I haven't met him myself..."},{"lineNumber":160536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつも君が自慢し、リア様も夢中のあの方」","translatedEnglishLine":"but you're always bragging about him, and Lady Ria is also enamored with that person.\""},{"lineNumber":160537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿、ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":160538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、彼は今、リーザスに向かっているらしい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it seems he is headed towards Leesas right now.\""},{"lineNumber":160539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「城で会ったときは是非連れてきてくれよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When you meet him at the castle, please bring him along."},{"lineNumber":160540,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回のことはそういう任務だと思えばいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Think of this matter as that kind of mission.\""},{"lineNumber":160541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿がリーザスに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance is going to Leesas?\""},{"lineNumber":160542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それ、本当ですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-Is that true!?\""},{"lineNumber":160543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、メナド副将も興味があるかい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Vice Commander Menado, are you interested as well?\""},{"lineNumber":160544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no...\""},{"lineNumber":160545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「照れることはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's no need to be shy."},{"lineNumber":160546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼の話、リックに聞いていたのだろう？","translatedEnglishLine":"You've heard about him from Rick, right?"},{"lineNumber":160547,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミーハーだなんて思わないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't think you're just a fan.\""},{"lineNumber":160548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うう……そ、そういうアレでは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh... it's not really like that...\""},{"lineNumber":160549,"originalJapaneseLine":"メナドの赤面は単純な乙女心故だが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Menado blushed simply because of her innocent maiden heart,"},{"lineNumber":160550,"originalJapaneseLine":"知らぬエクスは奥ゆかしさと勘違いし微笑んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but unaware, Ex mistook it for modesty and smiled."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし信じられない男だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But he's an unbelievable man..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けたとは言え、あれほどの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though he lost, to show such

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣技の冴えを見せるとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: mastery of swordsmanship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いはあくまでも小競り合いであり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle was, after all, just a skirmish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長引けばお互い戦列が瓦解せぬよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if it dragged on, both sides' formations would collapse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに退いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so they retreated immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それまでの間とは言え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, even though it was only up until then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一人で魔人を引きつけ続けるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to continue drawing the demon alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充分人間離れした偉業であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was truly a remarkable, almost superhuman feat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「犠牲は少なければ少ないほどいい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The fewer the sacrifices, the better..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などと、欲が出た……言葉もない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was greedy... I have no words..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……充分に治る傷さ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's a wound that can be fully healed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう自分を責めるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't blame yourself like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メナド副将」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Vice Commander Menado."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼を後方まで輸送し治療させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Transport him to the rear and have him treated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍不在でも赤の軍は動かせるね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can still operate the Red Army even without the general, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック将軍には及びませんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I may not be General Rick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずや代役を務めきってみせます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I will definitely fulfill the role as his substitute!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この命に代えても！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if it costs my life!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まったく、赤の軍の兵はすぐに命を賭ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Really, the soldiers of the Red Army risk their lives so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し羨ましいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a bit envious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待って下さいエクス将軍！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please wait, General Ex!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分はまだ戦うことが――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can still fight—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出来ないだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can't, can you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、君にいなくなられるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, losing you would be

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕らにとっても辛い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: painful for us too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、君を失うことは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, losing you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対にあってはならない損失だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be a loss we must never suffer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、この場を自分のいない赤の軍と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, if you say you can't leave the Red Army in my absence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々、白の軍には任せられん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or trust us, the White Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言うなら僕も考えるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with this position, then I would reconsider..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、とんでもない話です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-That's an outrageous suggestion!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰あろうエクス殿になら……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially for Lord Ex...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――なら、分かるね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Then you understand, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクスはにっこり笑い――凄んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ex smiled gently—and then looked fierce.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、それでいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm, that's good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは戦いを続けられぬ情けなさに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick, frustrated that he could no longer continue the fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うなだれこそしたが、それ以上反論はしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lowered his head but did not argue further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ひゃ〜、さすが白の軍の将軍エクス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Whoa, as expected from General Ex of the White Army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの頑固なリック隊長をあっさり黙らせちゃった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he easily silenced that stubborn Captain Rick.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、僕は会ったことがないんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, I haven't met him myself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつも君が自慢し、リア様も夢中のあの方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you're always bragging about him, and Lady Ria is also enamored with that person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿、ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, you mean?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、彼は今、リーザスに向かっているらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it seems he is headed towards Leesas right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「城で会ったときは是非連れてきてくれよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you meet him at the castle, please bring him along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回のことはそういう任務だと思えばいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Think of this matter as that kind of mission."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿がリーザスに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance is going to Leesas?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それ、本当ですか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-Is that true!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、メナド副将も興味があるかい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Vice Commander Menado, are you interested as well?"
"Ah, no..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「照れることはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no need to be shy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼の話、リックに聞いていたのだろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've heard about him from Rick, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミーハーだなんて思わないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think you're just a fan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、うう……そ、そういうアレでは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, uh... it's not really like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メナドの赤面は単純な乙女心故だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Menado blushed simply because of her innocent maiden heart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らぬエクスは奥ゆかしさと勘違いし微笑んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but unaware, Ex mistook it for modesty and smiled.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: mastery of swordsmanship..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle was, after all, just a skirmish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長引けばお互い戦列が瓦解せぬよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if it dragged on, both sides' formations would collapse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに退いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so they retreated immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それまでの間とは言え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, even though it was only up until then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一人で魔人を引きつけ続けるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to continue drawing the demon alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充分人間離れした偉業であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was truly a remarkable, almost superhuman feat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「犠牲は少なければ少ないほどいい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The fewer the sacrifices, the better..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などと、欲が出た……言葉もない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was greedy... I have no words..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……充分に治る傷さ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's a wound that can be fully healed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう自分を責めるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't blame yourself like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メナド副将」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Vice Commander Menado."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼を後方まで輸送し治療させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Transport him to the rear and have him treated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍不在でも赤の軍は動かせるね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can still operate the Red Army even without the general, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック将軍には及びませんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I may not be General Rick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずや代役を務めきってみせます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I will definitely fulfill the role as his substitute!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この命に代えても！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if it costs my life!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まったく、赤の軍の兵はすぐに命を賭ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Really, the soldiers of the Red Army risk their lives so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し羨ましいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a bit envious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待って下さいエクス将軍！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please wait, General Ex!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分はまだ戦うことが――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can still fight—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出来ないだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can't, can you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、君にいなくなられるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, losing you would be

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕らにとっても辛い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: painful for us too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、君を失うことは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, losing you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対にあってはならない損失だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be a loss we must never suffer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、この場を自分のいない赤の軍と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, if you say you can't leave the Red Army in my absence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々、白の軍には任せられん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or trust us, the White Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言うなら僕も考えるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with this position, then I would reconsider..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、とんでもない話です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-That's an outrageous suggestion!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰あろうエクス殿になら……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially for Lord Ex...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――なら、分かるね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Then you understand, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクスはにっこり笑い――凄んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ex smiled gently—and then looked fierce.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、それでいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm, that's good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックは戦いを続けられぬ情けなさに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick, frustrated that he could no longer continue the fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うなだれこそしたが、それ以上反論はしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lowered his head but did not argue further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ひゃ〜、さすが白の軍の将軍エクス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Whoa, as expected from General Ex of the White Army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの頑固なリック隊長をあっさり黙らせちゃった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he easily silenced that stubborn Captain Rick.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、僕は会ったことがないんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, I haven't met him myself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつも君が自慢し、リア様も夢中のあの方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you're always bragging about him, and Lady Ria is also enamored with that person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿、ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, you mean?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、彼は今、リーザスに向かっているらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it seems he is headed towards Leesas right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「城で会ったときは是非連れてきてくれよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you meet him at the castle, please bring him along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回のことはそういう任務だと思えばいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Think of this matter as that kind of mission."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス殿がリーザスに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance is going to Leesas?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それ、本当ですか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-Is that true!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、メナド副将も興味があるかい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Vice Commander Menado, are you interested as well?"
"Ah, no..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「照れることはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no need to be shy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼の話、リックに聞いていたのだろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've heard about him from Rick, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミーハーだなんて思わないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think you're just a fan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、うう……そ、そういうアレでは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, uh... it's not really like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メナドの赤面は単純な乙女心故だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Menado blushed simply because of her innocent maiden heart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らぬエクスは奥ゆかしさと勘違いし微笑んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but unaware, Ex mistook it for modesty and smiled.
